Name: Date & Time
Range: Epoch seconds UTC

Name: Daylight Saving Time (DST)
Range: 0: Disabled, 1: Enabled

Name: Time Zone
Range: Time zone offset measured in seconds

Name: DST state
Range: 0: DST time not entered, 1: DST time entered

Name: DST offset
Range: N/A

Name: The Local Time
Range: Epoch seconds, local time of the SmartLogger

Name: Power on
Range: The data field can only be 0 for powering on all inverters.

Name: Power off
Range: The data field can only be 0 for powering off all inverters.

Name: Power on/off
Range: 0: Power off all inverters, 1: Power on all inverters

Name: Power on/off
Range: 0: Power on all inverters, 1: Power off all inverters

Name: Transfer trip
Range: 0: Run, 1: Fault outage. The device shuts down when it stops due to faults and does not respond to the startup request.

Name: Array reset
Range: The data domain can only be 0.

Name: Active adjustment
Range: Adjusts the total active output power of all inverters connected to the SmartLogger. The adjustment value that is beyond the range is discarded.

Name: Reactive adjustment
Range: Adjusts the total reactive output power of all inverters connected to the SmartLogger. The adjustment value that is beyond the range is discarded.

Name: Active adjustment
Range: Adjusts the total active output power of all inverters connected to the SmartLogger.

Name: Reactive adjustment
Range: Adjusts the total reactive output power of all inverters connected to the SmartLogger.

Name: Active power
Range: Adjusts the total active output power of all inverters connected to the SmartLogger. The percentage rnge is 0-100%.

Name: Power factor adjustment
Range: Adjusts the total reactive output power of all inverters connected to the SmartLogger. The range is (-1, -0.8] U [0.8, 1].

Name: DC current
Range: Equals the total input DC current of all inverters. If the value exceeds the range specified by I16, register 40554 is recommended.

Name: Input power
Range: Equals the total input power of all inverters.

Name: CO2 reduction
Range: Equals the total CO2 reduction of all inverters. If the value exceeds the range specified by U32, register 40550 is recommended.

Name: Active power
Range: Equals the total active output power of all inverters.

Name: Power factor
Range: Equals the total power factor of all inverters.

Name: Plant status
Range: Used by Qinghai 1: Unlimited power operation 2: Limited power operation 3: Idle 4: Outage (fault, maintenance etc.) 5: Communication interrupt

Name: Reactive power
Range: Equals the total reactive output power of all inverters

Name: CO2 reduction
Range: Equals the total CO2 reduction of allinverters.This register represents a larger value range compared with register 40523.

Name: DC current 2
Range: Equals the total input DC current of all inverters. This register represents a larger value range compared with register 40500.

Name: E-Total
Range: Equals the total energy yield generated by all inverters.

Name: E-Daily
Range: Equals daily energy yield generated by all inverters.

Name: Plant status
Range: Used by Xinjiang. 0: Idle, 1: On-grid, 2: On-grid: self derating, 3: On-grid: Power limit, 4: Planned outage, 5: Power limit outage, 6: Fault outage, 7: Communication interrupt

Name: Plant status
Range: Used by Ningxia. 1: On-grid, 2: Outage, 3: Maintenance, 4: Idle

Name: Active alarm sequence number
Range: N/A

Name: Historical alarm sequence number
Range: N/A

Name: Phase A current
Range: Equals the sum of phase A currents of all inverters.

Name: Phase B current
Range: Equals the sum of phase B currents of all inverters.

Name: Phase C current
Range: Equals the sum of phase C currents of all inverters.

Name: Reserved
Range: N/A

Name: Inverter Efficiency
Range: N/A

Name: Max. reactive adjustment
Range: Equals the total maximum power of all inverters connected in parallel multiplied by 60%.

Name: Min. reactive adjustment
Range: Equals the total maximum power of all inverters connected in parallel multiplied by 60% x (-1).

Name: Max. active adjustment
Range: Equals the total maximum power of all inverters connected in parallel.

Name: Locked
Range: 0: Locked, 1: Unlocked. If more than one inverter is on-grid and feeding power to the grid, the status is Unlocked.

Name: DI status
Range: Bit0: DI1 - Bit7: DI8 . 1: Closed, 0: Open. Equals the status of the eight DIs of the SmartLogger.

Name: ESN
Range: N/A

Name: System reset
Range: Resets the SmartLogger. The data domain is not checked.

Name: Fast device access
Range: Automatically allocates and searches for devices.

Name: Device operation
Range: First 10 registers: determine the device to be operated based on the ESN. The register content is the device ESN. Last register: If the operation Datatype is 0, the SmartLogger deletes inverters. If the operation Datatype is 1, the inverter alarm is reset on the SmartLogger side.

Name: Device access status
Range: 0: Search completed, 1: Search in progress, 2: Search failed

Name: Active power control mode
Range: 0: No limit, 1: DI active scheduling, 3: Percentage fixed-value limitation (open loop), 4: Remote scheduling, 6: Export Limitation (kW). 200: Remote output control. 65533: Slave SmartLogger. 65534: No scheduling

Name: Active power scheduling target value
Range: Target total active power for the SmartLogger active power scheduling

Name: Reactive power control mode
Range: 0: No output, 1: DI reactive, 2: Reactive power fix control, 3: Power factor fix control, 4: 9 -U characteristic curve, 5: cos(Phi) -P Pn characteristic curve, 6: 9 -U hysteresis curve (CE10 -16), 7: Remotescheduling, 9: Power factor closed-loop control(ole policy), 10: Power factor closed-loop control, 65533: Slave SmagLogger, 65534: no scheduling

Name: Reactive power scheduling curve mode
Range: 0: indicates the power factor, 1: indicates the reactive power fixed value

Name: Reactive power scheduling target value
Range: SmartLogger reactive power adjustment target value: power factor or total reactive power. The specific meaning depends on the reactive power scheduling mode. When the mode is the power factor, the gain is 1000. When the mode is the reactive power fixed value, the gain is 10.

Name: Rated plant capacity
Range: N/A

Name: Total rated capacity of grid-connected inverters
Range: N/A

Name: Conversion coefficient
Range: N/A

Name: Communication on status
Range: Status of communication between the SmartLogger and the servers of Japanese power companies: 0: Connection success, 1: Connection failed

Name: Communication on abnormal shutdown
Range: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Name: Auto start upon communication recovery
Range: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Name: System Time: year
Range: 2000-2068 (local time)

Name: Inspection
Range: 00:Start, 01:Stop

Name: IV curve scanning
Range: 00:Stop, 01:Start (64 Points), 02:Start (128 Points), 03:Start (256 Points)

Name: Alarm Info 1
Range: N/A

Name: Alarm Info 2
Range: N/A
